locations.description:
The entrance is made up to look like the wide gaping mouth of a sinister looking clown,
but you'll be darned if you miss the one bit of excitement to come to your town in months

Through the entrance you come to an open area to your left is a fortune teller with a sign outside of her tent that says 'Fortunes only a dollar!' and to your right is the freak show, in front of you is a broken down gateway with a sign above it that says 'Zombie Zoo'
locations.hint: go left, right, forward, back or front gate

locations.description: The Fortune Tellers looks up from her cards.'Hello! I've been waiting for you.'

dollar.text: She takes your money and a mist begins to swirl from nowhere.'Someone is thinking about you' She says,'someone far away from here, they want you to have this.' She begins digging through a small cloth bag attached to her hip and pulls out a small gem and hands it to you.

locations.description: You move debris out of the way so you can shimmy into the zoo, things are too quiet in here. You notice a key lying on the ground. The path goes off forward in front of you but you can also see it split to the right
locations.hint: take key,  Go forward, right, or back

locations.description: You reach a dead end with a zombie cage that looks like the door has been forced open from the inside. That would explain the zombies that seem to be roaming about.
You come to locked cage that appears to empty. There's a large lock on the door

key.text: The cage opens and you notice a small cave opening in the far back of the cage

locations.description: In the cave there is a large rock face with ornate carvings
locations.hint: The gem the fortune teller gave you is the right size to fit in the carvings

gem.text: A small compartment opens and  you reach in to find a small trophy with these words on it 'Congrats! that's all the zombie carnival of doom has for you currently, but feel free to continue to wander around and fight Zeds to your hearts content'
